name: Pinnacle Treatment Centers
description: Pinnacle Treatment Centers is a nationally recognized addiction treatment organization with over 135 locations across the U.S., including multiple facilities in Kentucky. They offer comprehensive, evidence-based addiction treatment including detox, residential rehab, outpatient care, and counseling services. Their Kentucky locations include Recovery Works London, Winchester Treatment Services, and Georgetown Medical.
source: Verified from official Pinnacle Treatment Centers website and search results
eligibility_requirements: Individuals seeking addiction treatment for alcohol or substance use disorders
populations_served: Individuals with alcohol and substance use disorders, including opioid, fentanyl, meth, cocaine, prescription drug, benzo, and Adderall addiction
cost_information: Accepts insurance, Medicaid, and offers payment options
languages_available: English, Spanish, and multiple other languages available
